Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie (Forest Park Branch) due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie (Forest Park Branch) due to a door problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
